archimate:BusinessCollaboration.name: Inovation Strategy Board
archimate:BusinessCollaboration.documentation:
Identify gaps and risks associated with a technology-first approach.
Objectives Establish, own and manage the Enterprise Architecture Strategy and technical roadmap (i.e. principles, standards, policies, guidelines and reference models). · Provide assurance of IT designs and components (including IT infrastructures, systems and applications) at the enterprise architecture level. · Decide on possible exceptions to be granted to request for deviations from the Enterprise Architecture Strategy and act as escalation point on matters related to its mandate. · Communicate the Enterprise Architecture Strategy throughout the organisation, so as to improve the maturity level of architecture discipline within Anglian Water. · Set and review the Enterprise Architecture Vision. · Agree and support the Reference Architecture for Anglian Water. · Identify and promote new opportunities and solutions liaising with the innovation board. · Guide and promote architecture implementation. · Support an environment conducive to sustained innovation and business engagement. · Operational oversight of service issues which may lead to architectural change.
Purpose The Enterprise IT Architecture Governance Board (AGB) provides a forum for decision makers on topics of enterprise-wide IT architecture to align their planning and give directions to IT operations and project teams.
Structure
Meeting to be initially monthly or by exception through project/programme escalation.
Structure and frequency to be reviewed quarterly.
Represented by Enterprise Architects/CTO from each programme or lead architect of a major project.
